name: market for hydrocarbons, aromatic, cyclic (C9+) | hydrocarbons, aromatic, cyclic (C9+) | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/30309/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'hydrocarbons, aromatic, cyclic (C9+)' in the Global geography.;'hydrocarbons, aromatic, cyclic (C9+)' is usually not transported and directly consumed on site.;The product 'hydrocarbons, aromatic, cyclic (C9+)' represents a gaseous mixture of cyclic aromatic hydrocarbon compounds with 9 carbon atoms or more. It can be used in the following applications: chemical synthesis.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce hydrocarbons, aromatic, cyclic (C9+), within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of hydrocarbons, aromatic, cyclic (C9+),  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/202:Manufacture of other chemical products
